artist: Uragami Shunkin; Kikuchi Gozan; Aone Kyūkō; Ueno Setsugaku; Ikeda Unshō; Yamamoto Chikuun; Taigadō Teiryo; Tomitori Hōsai; Tanomura Chokunyū
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: album with heavily worn dark blue cover; images of flowers, landscapes, and a few calligraphic poems inside
medium: Ink and color on paper and silk
title: Album with Paintings and Calligraphy
